title: News24.com | The coronavirus 'vaccine' Ekurhuleni wants to import doesn't exist
description: The "vaccine" Ekurhuleni mayor is hoping to buy from a Cuban-Chinese company isn't a vaccine. Itâs a drug - and it's not proven to work against the virus that causes Covid-19.
content:
Applause erupted during Ekurhuleni's state of the city address, about 10 days ago, after Mayor Mzwandile Masina announced that he would be using the city's emergency funds to procure a coronavirus vaccine.No such vaccine exists yet.
